revised_title: Sir Harold Montague Finniston: A Pioneering Metallurgist and Administrator
tldr: The article is a biographical memoir of Sir Harold Montague Finniston, a prominent metallurgist and administrator. Born in Glasgow, Finniston excelled in his studies and went on to make significant contributions to the fields of metallurgical chemistry and nuclear energy. He held various positions, including Chief Metallurgist at the Atomic Energy Authority's Harwell, and later became the Managing Director and Chairman of International Research and Development Company. Finniston was known for his ability to organize, run, and inspire successful scientific teams, and his influence on the development of materials science and technology is celebrated in this memoir.
